website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, portable alternative to plastic, although a few upgrades would make it even better. 3-person capacity could be a stretch.
pros: Generous storage space for paddles, gear, life jackets
Very forgiving around rocks, limbs, other hazards
cons: Standard seats provide minimal back support

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak and oars, terrible seats!!
customer_reviews.text: This kayak is portable, easy to transport, easy to inflate, durable, and is quite maneuverable on the water. The oars are pretty darn good for the price of this package. The only bad thing I can say - and I can't emphasize enough just how bad they are - is the inflatable seats are horrible! They are next to absolutely useless. Seriously, the inflatable seats included with this package ARE GARBAGE. They offer ZERO back support - NONE!! You will have to purchase better seats if you value your back at all. Other than TERRIBLE SEATS, this is a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ZekeDoom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We have take the kayaks out 4-5 times now. Last couple of times in shallow water with rocks (class 2-3). Easy to inflate. 10 min for 2 kayaks. between my 10 and 12 yr old, we have a system and can have the 2 kayaks ready to rock and roll in 10-15 min. The foot pumps are truly awesome to a point we don't even use the electric pump we got as a back up. Tracking is a minor issue, but it is an inflatable, so expected. The carry bags are cumbersome and would have been nice to be back mounted like back packs rather than a satchel.
customer_reviews.author: BusyB

customer_reviews.title: Seats are worthless, not deluxe like package indicates.
customer_reviews.text: Deluxe package but doesn't come with the deluxe seats? What a rip, and each deluxe seat is $50 extra? The seats that came with this thing can't even pass as a seat. Wish I would have known before purchasing. I'm considering sending back.
customer_reviews.author: William Von Scutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inflatable boat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent inflatable boat! Took to the Outer Banks NC and had a blast paddling in the sound. Very tough, easy to transport, east to inflate and deflate. Be sure to get the version with the better seats I think they offer much more back support. Husband and I are in our 50s and both weigh about 240-250lb. I think this boat is untippable. Be sure to have dry bag and dry phone bag also.
customer_reviews.author: R Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for boating around the beaches in Connecticut for a father and son team
customer_reviews.text: Our family uses this boat all the time on the ocean in Connecticut and it works great. Easy to inflate and deflate, easy to transport in a small hatchback...however, it can be a tight squeeze into the bag. Just needs regular cleaning because of the salt water otherwise the paddles don't come apart. One of the seat cushions had a leak and we asked customer service for help. They immediately answered (Friday night after 8pm EST!) and we had the replacement cushion at our house on Tuesday - for free. Thanks much!
customer_reviews.author: JH.

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable...
customer_reviews.text: Standard seats are useless... & uncomfortable... You should sell the inflatable kayak with the delux seat only... I learned one valuable lesson from REI... customer experience is the source of customer satisfaction... wasting a customers time, trying out what will give the less then the best experience costs you in the long run. Your price point is great, increase sales with product performance, not with an add sale that should have been included. Provide other add on items like a soft side cooler, rod holders, etc.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact it takes a few minutes to inflate, this is a great product. We take it out two or three times a week in various spots around St Petersburg and have found it easy to handle and fun to operate. Perfect for those of us who have smaller RVs in which to travel as it is easy to pack and unfold when at our destinations.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Ty

customer_reviews.title: Remove the Skags for white water
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to use it on white water, remove the skags. They don't help tracking and will get you hung on things. No issue unless you spin to get free. Then have your patch kit handy. Cut mine off today. I can see where they would be good on flat water. Might be better if they were removable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!!!!so much fun!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family laughed when I told them I bought an inflateable kayak. And then we all went on a vacation to cape cod for a week, where we unpacked an assembled the kayak. Took about ten minutes, pumped up fast! And when we took it out everyone was amazed how stable, and seaworthy it was. It made the vacation. This is an awesome kayak, and so easy to pack up, its really amazing. You could never imagine this quality for such a great price. Buy it and let the fun begin!!!
customer_reviews.author: BeesHD1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Kayak
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have my hopes high for this kayak. But all I can say is wow. It was easy to inflate quickly, and it handled great in the water. Very stable, I let boat wakes in the lake hit me broadside and I didn't even come close to flipping. Plenty of room for two people in the 370. Also very easy to paddle.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Only been out with it once. Seems to be well made. Pretty roomy. With both my husband & I on it, we fit with our legs bent slightly.
customer_reviews.author: The Crowtons

customer_reviews.title: Low logistics kayaks
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Ready used them 2x on river with rapids and shallow water here and there. Not made for 3 adults but definitely 2 full size adults and gear or 1 full size adult and 2 kids. It is so easy to inflate and deflate and place in trunk of car.
customer_reviews.author: DaCincyKid

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak but needs better seats to come standard.
customer_reviews.text: Kayak is easy to maneuver, stable and fun. Easy to inflate and de-flate. The seats are another issue. Does not support the back well and also may have it's own weight limit. Was totally flat when we got back to shore. The seats are not made of the same grade of material as the boat.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: An excellent boat
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to take it out for a float yet but I did get it unwrapped and inflated and take a picture of it. I's bigger than I expected but I like a big boat. They are easier to control and move faster through the water. That's what I need for when I add a sail to this boat in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: John Dye

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better to relax on A lake
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better to relax on A lake, but in this two person kayak. Comfortable, light, easy to blow up and most importantly, sturdy. Great for being out on the water watching the eagles.
customer_reviews.author: Kcast

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine was defective
customer_reviews.text: I used this kayak for about 10 minutes in a small pond once I got in the mail just to test it out. I cleaned it off with the water hose and stored it in my garage. The next morning I found one side to be deflated although I was never able to locate an actual hole.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy to use because we can out it in the car and don't need trailers or other special equipment
customer_reviews.author: Bookie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Have used it a few times and no leaks or holes as of yet. Easy to maneuver, not too long to inflate. It comes with a foot pump but you can purchase a separate automatic pump for even easier inflatability. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina LaPierre

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Only drawback as indicated in other reviews was the seats that were provided. My wife in the back did well because she could lean against the stern end of the kayak giving her the needed back support. I had to bear up for an hour and a half with the minimal support provided but I am going to have to make some alterations before going out again. It would be a lot better if they offered the package with the deluxe seats even if they had to increase the price instead of having to order new seats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are junk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these, when it arrived we opened it and inflated to see how it works. It had a hole in one of the sides. We sent it back for an exchange, and when that one arrived it also had a hole in the other side. So much for quality control. These are junk
customer_reviews.author: Keith Grubaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is super easy to inflate and very stable. We have only taken it out once, but we had a great time and look forward to many more fun trips with this kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Computers

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing kayak. Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing kayak. Loved it. Fits 2 adults and a 6 year old very comfortably. Can't wait to get it back in the water.
customer_reviews.author: shill

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Have just done a trial run. Super easy to inflate. Looks durable. Is a little heavier than I expected, but hopefully a thick skin will avois punctures.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Hawke

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This kayak was great. We bought it for the family to be able to go out and my young son to be able to just ride along. The kayak tracks well and was low effort to paddle. It is comfortable. The seats need to be inflated very stiffly but overall it was comfy. I was happy with the stability of the product, and the short hour trip we went on the other day was fun and passed without any incident. I would definitely recommend this product to someone interested in a low cost solution to a tandem. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MarkP

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely stable, easy to inflate (wish they included an extra inflation cap or cap band. We snapped on on the first inflate. plenty of room the two of us and our Brittany. Would be crowded with a third adult.
customer_reviews.author: Bubble Logix

customer_reviews.title: Still going after 5 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kayak 5 years ago. I’ve used it out at sea and on rivers and I have had much fun. I have patched it twice. I find it very comfortable and always feel safe. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Julio A. Toro

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable and easy to use kayak
customer_reviews.text: Wife, kids, and I all love this awesome inflatable kayak. On multiple uses, pure recreation, no complaints about this kayak package overall. My only suggestion to Sea Eagle company would be to put the more premium seats into all of its products. These standard seats are okay, but not for any long-term kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: SSH

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak for the money
customer_reviews.text: Our family owns four of these Kyaks and we use them on Washingtons Methow River. They are tough and they steer you through the white water with ease. They are also very forgiving in the big boulders if you bang into one of them, don't try that in a solid built boat. Get out there!
customer_reviews.author: Hoop

customer_reviews.title: Love this kayak
customer_reviews.text: Love this kayak. I’m not a water person but feel very secure in this kayak. The upgraded seats are a a must have. The manufacturer stands behind their products. There was a major problem with my original purchase and they were quick to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: We are surprisingly pleased with this kayak. Lightweight to carry, inflates in minutes and very comfortable. Everything we wanted and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Portable, All positives
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE it! It's sturdy, easy to inflate/deflate, doesn't tip over when we get out and in. Everything positive to say about this kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Miss CAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun in a bag.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Quick to setup, break down. Wonderful product. So portable, nice to be able to go kayaking without the hassle of boat tie down.
customer_reviews.author: MrFishk

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and great quality. Took it out many times last summer and was surprised at how comfortable and stable it is. Thick material so I’m not too worried about it popping
customer_reviews.author: Dlw

customer_reviews.title: Easy of setup
customer_reviews.text: Love this kayak! Bought for my husbands birthday in July, have used six times already. Easy and quick to setup and tear down. This is sturdier than I thought and made well. We’re having so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than we thought, but a nice item.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and seaworthy, but much heavier than described for hauling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stable
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Was so much fun. Worried at first it would be unstable but to our surprise it was very stable on the water. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ptoobie

customer_reviews.title: Great for easy transport and storage
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a two person kayak to use when the grandchildren visit. This has been a good option that works fine on our lake and river and can be easily inflated and deflated for storage and transporting in a trunk.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Get one....you'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It tracks beautifully in the water, much better than expected; and it fits into the side compartment of our RV. We couldn't be happier with it. One of the fittings leaked at first, but a hair dryer did the trick, just as promised. We snapped one of the little o-rings while trying to secure it to the boat and the company replaced it on one day.
customer_reviews.author: Patty B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent canoe incredibly stable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent canoe incredibly stable...I put 3 sections of three quarter inch plywood in the bottom for safety. ..this canoe won't capsize...
customer_reviews.author: John Finney

customer_reviews.title: Great kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Heavy but great in the water. Seats are a little bit weird but it was cozy
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaRose

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to use this kayak. My husband and son took it out one time and then the next morning it had a leak. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Tester

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Product lives up to expectations--easy to inflate and deflate and to use on water.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Get the best seats available.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the seats that came with the package. I had to upgrade to the seats available.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I used my Sea Eagle 370 for the first time Sat at a nearby lake. I was completely satisfied . It was easy to blow up and easy to handle in the water. The kids loved it. my 9 and 10 year olds took it out by themselves and had a blast. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Adair

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed the boat so far! I also like how they provide a big enough bag to store the boat in without it being a pain to fit it back in, like a tent is.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity in Kayaking
customer_reviews.text: The Sea Eagle SE370 Inflatable is easy to use. It took approximately 15 min. to set it up and 15 mins. to pack it up. This kayak is easy to travel with and opens opportunities in a variety of water conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa54

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak for family outings. The extra space in the 370 over the 330 definitely worth it for us. Stable, easy to pack away once you figure out the best method and feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: BandG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this has been a very fun vessel throughout the summer! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: nk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves this kayak. It is really strong, and three people fit in it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are absolutely loving our inflatable kayak! We've used it every weekend since we got it. SO portable and convenient! Last weekend we even towed a two-man raft behind it with our camping gear and camped on a little island in the Sebastian Inlet (Florida). It worked famously! I would recommend this kayak to anyone. We have had absolutely no problems. Well, actually, the foot pump (included) did not have the necessary nozzles when it arrived which made the first attempt at inflating the kayak a challenge. However, we notified the seller, and the missing nozzles were mailed out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Patty J. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great for pulling up to any spot along a river or lake. Just ten minutes to inflate and off you go. Fits 2 large adults or 3 smaller ones. I'm really glad I got it. You can even take it backwoods camping if you are hefty enough to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - great fun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment! Fun, stable, tracks quite nicely and not too much effort. takes the dogs without any hassle
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Sea eagle 370
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kayak to escape NYC in an apocalypse....it's heavier than I imagined....I can fit it in a internal frame back pack and it's easier to carry than the supplied bag. Me and my girlfriend tried it out twice on a river. Inflated great....the kayak once inflated is light...very easy to carry and move to the water with 2 people. The deluxe seats are very comfortable. We noticed that it is hard to paddle straight....but we expected that with an inflatable. Overall it functions as advertised and we love it...no roof racks, no overhead lifting. Fits in the back of our Kia sportage with extra room left over!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Useful as last resort!
customer_reviews.text: Item is heavy and awkward to carry. When in kayak there is very little side way room. The only good news is it floats and works in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: missing a seat
customer_reviews.text: The Sea Eagle inflatable Kayak has 2-person and 3-person models, we bought this SE370 specifically to get a 3-person one but the package we got has only 2 seats. It was pretty confusing that on the production description it says 2-person and somewhere else 3-person. I thought the place where it mentioned 2-person is probably because they just copied it from the 2-person model and thought it would have 3 seats when we get our kayak. So what do they think, I buy this 3-person model and I order an additional seat separately? If they had said so I might have done it or not order this kayak at all. This is kind of misleading.
customer_reviews.author: dexin

customer_reviews.title: barrels of fun
customer_reviews.text: buy it. really if you are thinking about it, buy it.It can really sit three persons in a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: y. phildickian

product_meta.title: Sea Eagle 370 Deluxe 3 Person Inflatable Portable Sport Kayak Canoe w/ Paddles
feature_bullets: 3 person/650 lb capacity, weighs 26 lbs, suitable for up to Class III whitewater
370 Deluxe Kayak Package features two movable, super comfortable Deluxe Kayak Seats for improved back support and 2 paddles, foot pump, and carry bag
2 AB30 7'10"" 4 Part Paddles with asymmetrical blade and aluminum shaft.Seam:High Frequency Welded
2 skegs on the bottom for better tracking & speed.Inflation Pressure:1.1 psi
Open and close drain valve, 5 deluxe 1-way inflation/deflation valves

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
